description:
Deal 1 to an ally and give another ally +2|+2 this round.
Shuffle a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Vladimir</style></link> into deck.
descriptionRaw:
Deal 1 to an ally and give another ally +2|+2 this round.
Shuffle a Vladimir into deck.
flavorText: "It's give and take, my dear. You give, and I take." - Vladimir
name: Vladimir's Transfusion
